DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study confirm safety efficacy diquafosol tetrasodium ophthalmic solution , 2 % vs. placebo , subject dry eye disease .
DOC.brief_title: The Effects Diquafosol Tetrasodium Ophthalmic Solution , 2 % Subjects With Dry Eye Disease ( P08637 )
DOC.criteria: Have best correct visual acuity eye least +0.7 good Central corneal stain 3 NEI scale If female , nonpregnant nonlactating Have history dry eye disease eye Have normal lid anatomy Unable withhold use contact lenses study 2 week prior study Have ocular surface surgery within past year Are consider legally blind one eye Have serious medical condition could confound study assessment
